title: Registration for the 2026 season is open
excerpt: Wrestling will start December 1st, 2025. Please contact Sean Grudzinski at Sean@matdogs.com if you have any questions about the upcoming season.

title: Jesse Thielke Big Throw Camp Rescheduled
excerpt: The Jesse Thielke Big Throw Camp has been rescheduled for November 2nd and 3rd. This is an excellent opportunity for wrestlers to learn throwing techniques from an expert.

title: GSBT 2022 Tournament Success
excerpt: The Grant Schoen Beginners Tournament was a huge success with over 200 young wrestlers participating. Thank you to all volunteers and families who made this event possible.

title: Ben Peterson Visit 2022
excerpt: Olympic wrestling champion Ben Peterson visited our club and provided invaluable coaching and inspiration to our young athletes. A once-in-a-lifetime experience for our Matdogs.

title: Support the Matdogs: Become a Sponsor
excerpt: We are now an official non-profit organization and all donations are tax deductible. Your sponsorship helps provide equipment, coaching, and tournament opportunities for our young wrestlers.
